face.transformationDescription:
[npc.Her] face starts to extend into a long muzzle, [npc.her] teeth growing sharp, sexy-looking fangs. #IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) A layer of [npc.faceSkin+] quickly grows to cover [npc.her] new face, #ELSE Just like the rest of [npc.her] body, [npc.her] new face is [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceSkin+], #ENDIF and as the transformation finally comes to an end, [npc.sheIs] left panting and sighing as [npc.she] [npc.verb(try)] to catch [npc.her] breath.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] a Lilithian Lucario face, [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription].
face.bodyDescription: [npc.SheHasFull] [npc.a_feminineDescriptor(true)] Lilithian Lucario face [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription(true)], with a marking stretching across [npc.her] eyes.
